page.title: 17COMMONSIDE'S TRADING LINKS
page.content: THIS BLOCK IS WELL-SERVED BY MOBILE VENDORS; A BAKER'S VAN COMES TWICE EACH WEEK, MILKMAN THRICE, FISHMAN (SELLING FISH LANDED AT FRASERBURGH) ONCE. THE LATTER ALSO HAS A GOOD SELECTION OF FRUIT, VEGETABLES & GROCERIES ON BOARD. ONCE A MONTH A WHOLEFOODS TRADER FROM DENHOLM BY THE NAME OF THE BEAN MACHINE CALLS BEARING GOODS RANGING FROM PULSES TO PAPADOMS, HONEY TO VINEGARS & DRIED FRUITS TO SPICES. NUMEROUS SALESMEN WORKING FOR AGRICULTURALLY ORIENTED FIRMS TRADE FROM DOOR TO DOOR, BUSINESS TENDS TO BE DONE WITH THE KENT FACES. SEVERAL PEOPLE LIVING IN THIS BLOCK ARE SELF-EMPLOYED, WORKING FROM THEIR HOMES. THESE INCLUDE A CARPET FITTER, CHARTERED SURVEYOR. A LADY RUNS A BED & BREAKFAST BUSINESS IN HER HOME, SITUATED RIGHT BESIDE THE A7. A MAN HAS SET UP A BUSINESS IN CHIMNEYS.
